    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>

    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_105899</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_105899</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Heating calcium carbonate</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Heizung Kalziumkarbonat</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Carbonate de calcium de chauffage</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Carbonato de cálcio do heating</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Carbonato di calcio del heating</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θερμαντικό ανθρακικό άλας ασβεστίου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Carbonato de calcio de la calefacción</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows a setup that is used to heat up a piece of calcium carbonate to form calcium oxide and carbon dioxide.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Bunsen burner</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">calcium carbonate</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">calcium oxide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Carbon dioxide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chemical reaction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">heat</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">metal grill</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt eine Installation, die 
verwendet wird, um herauf ein Stück Kalziumkarbonat zu erhitzen, um 
Kalziumoxid und Kohlendioxyd zu bilden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme montre une installation qui est 
employée pour réchauffer un morceau de carbonate de calcium pour 
former l'oxyde de calcium et l'anhydride carbonique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra uma instalação que seja 
usada se aquecer acima de uma parte de carbonato de cálcio para dar 
forma ao óxido de cálcio e ao dióxido de carbono.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema mostra una messa a punto che è 
usata per riscaldare una parte del carbonato di calcio per formare 
l'ossido di calcio e l'anidride carbonica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα εμφανίζει μια οργάνωση που 
χρησιμοποιείται για να θερμάνει επάνω ένα κομμάτι του ανθρακικού
άλατος ασβεστίου για να διαμορφώσει το οξείδιο ασβεστίου και το 
διοξείδιο του άνθρακα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra una disposición que se 
utilice para calentar encima de un pedazo de carbonato de calcio para 
formar el óxido de calcio y el bióxido de carbono.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bunsenbrenner</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kalziumkarbonat</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kalziumoxid</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kohlendioxyd</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">chemische Reaktion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hitze</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Metallgrill</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
